definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟聯苯是合成消炎鎮痛藥氟苯水楊酸的關鍵中間體。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the utilization of narcotic analgesics in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解我院門診麻醉性鎮痛藥的使用情況。
麻醉性鎮痛藥和酒中毒。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of analgesics in chronic non-cancer pain.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解鎮痛藥在慢性非癌痛中的應用情況。

sentences.english: Objective To synthesize non-steroids anti-inflammation drug Flurbiporfen.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用新的方法合成非甾體抗炎鎮痛藥氟比洛芬。

sentences.english: The painkillers can also be highly addictiveand lead to mood changes.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉鎮痛藥還有着導致人情緒改變的致癮作用。
